3: There's still 2km until the city center.
Should be Cerberus and Tifa—this is their usual commotion.
Ah, there's an ally Construct up ahead.
But why isn't it sending out signals to identify itself?
That's a... survivor from the Suzaku squad!
The logs mentioned that their equipment has all been destroyed, including their comms.
He's heading toward the swarm of Corrupted by himself...
Don't let him be surrounded, quickly!
